attributes.action: divert all defense budgets to researching, discovering & building "powder" snow cannons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Indoor snow areas have become very popular in the last few years, surely it would be possible with the whole defense budget to create a snow cannon that can create realistic powder snow. Stop making bombs, make powder. Powder = love.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
